!Grand Magister Jurek: I see you have not completed the task that I assigned you. Please, you must hunt *Monster Eye Destroyers, the Breka Orc Shamans, and Shackles*. Now hurry! Monster Eye Destroyers inhabit the Plains of Dion. Breka Orc Shamans are found in Breka's Stronghold. And Shackles are found in the Crater of Ivory Tower.
